ModInfo.description:
Harmony DLL can be used by mods to patch C# methods at runtime.
DLL mods that use Harmony are usually compatible with other DLL mods, so multiple mods of this type can be active at the same time, unlike DLL mods that don't use Harmony: only a single DLL mod that overrides the GameFactory class can be active at any time.
This mod doesn't change anything by itself because it only contains the Harmony DLL and nothing else. 0Harmony.dll v2.2.2 for .Net Framework 4.7.2 taken directly from the Harmony homepage: https://github.com/pardeike/Harmony
ModInfo.author: Fimbulvetr
